pages.title: Bundle
pages.text: The rabbit hide bundle is obtained by combining some rabbit hide and strings in a crafting table as show on the right.$(br2)This bundle has 64 slots or 1 stack of storage.

pages.title: Hello world !
pages.text: The bundle can also be ??? further into a Copper Bundle.
